location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP SHOWING BOUNDARY BETWEEN SYRIA AND PALESTINE: SHEET I'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paper.Dimensions: 193 x 375mm, on sheet 300 x 390mm.

mods.abstract: Sheet I, map reproduced by the Survey of Egypt (21/677/1), and appearing as an appendix to the Agreement between His Majesty's Government and the French Government respecting the Boundary Line between Syria and Palestine from the Mediterranean to El Hamm√©(1923).The map shows a red boundary line, proceeding from Ras en-Najura to Jebel Ghabieh. It shows trigonometrical points, intersected points, boundary posts, roads and wadis.
